channel.title: CVE Feed for Flexera Software LLC -- Linux Kernel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Flexera Software LLC -- Linux Kernel

item.title: CVE-2017-16913|2024-09-16T19:47:31.753Z -- flexera%20software%20llc -- linux%20kernel
item.description: The "stub_recv_cmd_submit()" function (drivers/usb/usbip/stub_rx.c) in the Linux Kernel before version 4.14.8, 4.9.71, and 4.4.114 when handling CMD_SUBMIT packets allows attackers to cause a denial of service (arbitrary memory allocation) via a specially crafted USB over IP packet.
